attention.delivery: 🚘 Delivery from €25 for Paris(75), €35 for Greater Paris metro/RER
attention.ordertime: 📆 24h in advance for small cakes, 2 days in advance for 4 inch or above cakes
attention.frozen: 🧊 All desserts should be refrigerated on arrival and ice cream cakes should be frozen
attention.occasion: 🍰 We accept all kinds of cakes for special occasions (weddings/centenary parties/birthday parties, etc.), please contact us directly, prices may be adjusted according to demand
attention.allergy: 🥜 Please inform in advance if you have any allergies, contraindications (alcohol/coffee/nuts etc.)
attention.fresh: 🍑 All desserts are made on the same day, fresh ingredients guaranteed
attention.thanks: 🧸 Personal workshop capacity is limited, thanks for your trust and understanding
custo.detail: Personalised with your choice of style and colour(Pls contact us for details)
custo.flavor: Chiffon Flavours: original, Chocolate, Matcha, Coffee, Earl Grey
custo.cream: Cream flavours: Original, Caramel, Matcha, Chocolate, Chestnut
classic.cheeseCake: Original / Pearl Milk Tea / Blueberry CheeseCake
